title: Pass It On
description: A chain reaction between users to spread pure joy!
author: Sophy Henn
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n2W3kbQ28IE

content.caption: The user walks into the room, sees a room full of balloons and feels the joyful atmosphere.
Users stand on the graphic to release a balloon.
The users run through the space, releasing a trail of balloons with delight.
The user stands on the graphic and releases the balloons as a chain reaction.
Users moving back and forth on the same circle to release more balloons!
